body:
It sounds like this is just a matter of how items are being displayed in your terminal, so I'd suggest messing around with display options to see what you want.

If however that's not the case please re-open with a reproducible example:

http://matthewrocklin.com/blog/work/2018/02/28/minimal-bug-reports

Thank you very much for your response, I tried different ways and tried in
different ide's but the read_excel function does not read more than 45
charecters. That is if a cell of the excel sheet has more than 45 letters
in it then the rest of the data is being printed as "...".  I will open the
issue like you said.
ᐧ

On Thu, Jun 14, 2018 at 11:13 PM, William Ayd <notifications@github.com>
